summary: More Information On This Month's Nintendo Switch Online Games
title: More Information On This Month's Nintendo Switch Online Games
body:
More Information On This Month’s Nintendo Switch Online Games

After falling from Angel Land, the NES™ games launching on Nintendo Switch Online this month have landed on a tropical paradise. On March 13, classics Kid Icarus™ and StarTropics™ join dozens of other NES games as part of the Nintendo Entertainment System™ – Nintendo Switch Online collection.

  • Kid Icarus – The evil goddess Medusa has stolen the Three Sacred Treasures and imprisoned the goddess…

View On WordPress

blog.name: thevideogameartarchive
blog.title: The Video Game Art Archive
blog.description:
The Video Game Art Archive is dedicated to scanning and extracting classic video game artwork at the best resolutions possible!

Support us on Patreon!
We update four times a day with new artwork from long forgotten games that have never had their art available. Looking for a specific game? Check out the Archive! You might get lucky!
Also follow our other blog: Want to help us continue our work? Help via PayPAL

title: Kid Icarus y StarTropics llegan a Nintendo Switch Online
body:
Kid Icarus y StarTropics llegan a Nintendo Switch Online

Nuevos juegos de NES están por aterrizar en Nintendo Switch Online. El 13 de marzo, los clásicos Kid Icarus y StarTropics se unen a docenas de otros juegos de NES como parte de la colección de Nintendo Entertainment System.

En Kid Icarus, la diosa malvada Medusa ha robado los Tres Tesoros Sagrados y ha encarcelado a la diosa de la luz, Palutena, en su malvada conspiración para controlar a todos.…

summary: Back in 2018, the Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra conducted a Legend of Zelda orchestral concert in Tokyo, Japan. If you weren’t...
body:
Back in 2018, the Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra conducted a Legend of Zelda orchestral concert in Tokyo, Japan. If you weren’t lucky enough to experience the concert firsthand, worry not- you can now snag your very own copy of the performances to listen to within the comfort of your own home. Several different listings appeared on Amazon Japan today, both of which feature international shipping. There is a regular, double CD release which costs ¥3,240 (~$29 USD) and a limited edition which costs ¥4,972 (~$44.50 USD). The limited edition comes with the basic CDs as well as a Blu-ray copy of the performances, a “metallic placard”, and some acrylic charms.

This slideshow requires JavaScript.

Let us know in the comments below if you plan on picking one of these Legend of Zelda: Concert 2018 releases for yourself. Also, if you’re interested in grabbing the limited edition, try to do so quickly as they are limited in quantity.

SOURCE

Amazon Listings Appear for Legend of Zelda Concert CD & Blu-Ray Back in 2018, the Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra conducted a Legend of Zelda orchestral concert in Tokyo, Japan.

blog.name: request-roaxes
blog.title: Request a post!
blog.description:
Main blog: Roaxes.tumblr.com
This blog is made for all requests made to me for SFM and game screenshots (No NSFW)
This was made since some requests I don't feel comfortable posting on my main blog. To request something, please read the models list and rules first then hit request!

summary: If it isn't too much trouble, how bout a general image of Palutena being proud of Pit like a mother proud of her kid? could be...

answer:
Nice KO!

blog.name: kuribo4indahouse
blog.title: kuribo4's Paradise
blog.description:
I am a human being. I like films, videogames, etc.
FOLLOW ME!
I have an AT-Field, I can use the Force, and I have Link's pocket.
I understood Evangelion.
I don't lose my way!
(L)
23, male, heteroshrekshual
On this blog you'll find Evangelion, Kill la Kill and any Gainax/Trigger show really. Utena as well. And Nintendo related stuff. And stupid shit. Goku might show up sometimes.
Big fan of FFVII as well.
Star Wars fan also. Empire is still the GOAT.
There might be spoilers for all that stuff, I am extra careful with new releases though.
This description is a mess, I have just been adding stuff to it for 6 years lol.
